A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very disappointed in the film. I think the story is getting old. I did not like the humor\, character development\, or the plot direction. It seemed out of place at times and unorganized. And the ending did not produce a feeling of excitement or anticipation of what is to come. Of all 6 major releases\, this was by far the worst. While I did appreciate the spirit of the story I just could not bring myself to give it a strong rating. Luke's destiny was the strongest part of the story but not enough to save it. The better bring in some big guns to save the saga. Good luck!
